segments.text: My heart is practically pounding watching this unfolding scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink is overflowing so rapidly; the water is spreading quickly across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is right in it, and she's not even reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so afraid she's going to slip and fall, perhaps dropping those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look at that boy on the stool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out, and it's teetering; he's going to fall for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could seriously hurt himself, reaching so high like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he brings the whole cookie jar down on his head?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing so close, she might get caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of the gushing water must be audible, yet no one seems to hear it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is filled with such impending danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out a warning to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a terrifying moment to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
